page.title: 03Christchurch Park Ipswich
page.content: The park is situated near to the centre of town. The park orginally belonged to the mansion which is situated in the south-east corner.Today the park is free for anyone to use.The mansion is 'famous' in Ipswich.It was built about 500 years ago.The majority of people use the park Â£as a nice place to have a walk'.The park is split into two sections,the arboretum where plants,trees and shrubs come from many different countries.The other part is much larger and has many large grass areas.Many people use the park as a short-cut to the centre of town.We interviewed 40 people and only about 5 lived more than a couple of miles from the park.The park has a playground and several tennis courts.The park has one quite large duck pond as well as a circular pond by the Mansion.
